text: Neotogaria is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae of the Drepanidae. ==Species== * Neotogaria anguligera (Hampson, 1893) * Neotogaria baenzigeri Laszlo, G. Ronkay, L. Ronkay & Witt, 2007 * Neotogaria flammifera (Houlbert, 1921) * Neotogaria galema (Swinhoe, 1894) * Neotogaria hoenei (Sick, 1941) * Neotogaria saitonis Matsumura, 1931 * Neotogaria thomaswitti Laszlo, G. Ronkay & L. Ronkay, 2007 ==References== * , 1931, Insecta Matsumurana 7: 195. * , 2007, Esperiana Buchreihe zur Entomologie Band 13: 1-683 Category:Thyatirinae Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Neotogaria
